data.name: Schism
data.detailed_description:
The far future is now, and the world is blanketed in garbage and missing its only source of power, the Schismatic Engine. You are a prisoner forced into the tallest trash-mountain with a cheap replica of the engine and a cheaper gun, tasked with finding it. If you survive and complete your mission, you will be a free man.

Gameplay
Schism is a roguelite action RPG with guns, gods, leveling, and frequency switching action. Gain many power-ups and weapons with strange effects, level-up and choose the stats you want for better control, and fight difficult bosses with your schismatic engine that switches between two frequencies.

Features
  • Top-Down shooting action with frequency switching and randomly generated levels you clear room by room
  • 100+ Relics to power you up with interesting and unique effects.
  • 30+ weapons ranging from practical to insane with many different weapon mods.
  • 12 gods to choose from that you must appease to get favor from.
  • 8 Stats to level up to customize your run
  • Events within levels that can help or hinder you.
  • Endless mode after the final boss to see how far you can go.
  • More content as I continue working on it!

Note: This game is in development and features are subject to change.
